General.Name: Investco Holding AS
General.Description: Investco Holding A.S. operates as an investment company in Turkey. It invests in companies operating in renewable energy, mining, chemistry, iron-steel, technology and software, venture capital, food, and healthcare industries. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Eski Büyükdere Str. No:9/52 Iz Plaza Giz, Istanbul, Turkey, 34398
